Mac Internet Explorer 5 0 Preview

21 Jan 2000

Mac OS Rumors recently posted a preview of the beta release of Internet Explorer 5.0 for the Mac. It includes screenshots and some fairly in-depth analysis of IE 5.0's features, speed, and other concerns. There's also some analysis of the Mac browser market and its future.
